The claim is supported by the head of Ta: s Sierra Club chapter, who warned the Hillsborough County Commission about the consequences of global warming and stated that the community is one of the 10 most threatened by sea level rise in the world.
The claim is backed by a report from glo: warming researchers Climate Central, which highlights the vulnerability of the Tampa Bay area to sea level rise and flooding caused by climate change.
